sort-imports.description:
Description

This rule checks allimportdeclarations and verifies that all imports are first sorted by the used member syntax and then alphabetically by the first member or alias name.

The--fixoption on the command line automatically fixes some problems reported by this rule: multiple members on a single line are automatically sorted (e.g.import { b, a } from 'foo.js'is corrected toimport { a, b } from 'foo.js'), but multiple lines are not reordered.
